title: Flu-Fighting Tips, and Diets that Don’t Destroy Your Metabolism
description:
Jillian attempts to prank call her girlfriend! Plus, things to do to stay well during another epic flu season; and a caller is concerned that working out too much might ruin her metabolism.


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com
